geography.address: 台灣嘉義太保, 六腳, 灣內

description.div: The Taibao 12th and 13th cemetery are small strips of lands located among the fields to the north of the Tianwei (天尾) community of Taibai City (太保市), to the east of Highway 37 and to the south of the Bazhang River (八掌溪)

The Bazhang River is one of the major rivers in southwestern Taiwan that flows through Chiayi County. It originates in the hills of central Taiwan and flows westward through the Chiayi plain, passing near Taibao City before eventually emptying into the Taiwan Strait. The river is an important water source for agricultural irrigation in the region, which is known for its fertile farmlands. The Tianwei community is located in the vicinity of this river system in the Taibao area.
